title: I just vsed a Cassiopeia :)
body:
A genuine Cassopiea, not a Zed or a Yasuo, not a Katarina or an Ekko, or a Fizz.. But a genuine honest-to-god Cassiopeia :)

I lost lane, I lost the game, and it was a beautiful thing. 

I wish I had caught this rare breed on film, the world thinks non-assassin mid laners only a myth, nothing more than a story we tell our children to make them feel safer in the mid lane, and not only was it a mage, but a rare one too! 
Cassiopeia _Magis-serpentus_,  I truly saw this terrific creature! No lie! 

An actual champion (in the mid lane even!) that isn't Yasuo or Zed, i would have never believed it had i not seen it with my own two eyes!

I will sleep tonight, a better man, a more fulfilled man. 

:')

replies.body:
From what I've seen, assassins are actually having a hard time at the moment. 

Vladimir and Viktor are solid picks. Even Cass mid is strong! :) 

I'm not a fan of the assassin mid meta myself, so I'm glad we've moved away from it.
Oh man, wait till you come across the beautiful Zyra mid.

I mean anything about probably mid silver, you should see less Yas/Zed and see more of the other mid lane picks.

Hell Plat+ is a good showing of this

http://champion.gg/statistics/#?sortBy=general.playPercent&order=descend&roleSort=Middle

my go to mid laners are fiddle and lulu and it works out most of the time.
its good to see people getting good at non meta champs in lane. very refreshing

God you would love me, whenever i mid lane its either some form of mage or low tier assassins like akali, or eve.

Yes midlane eve (it works quite nicely actually)
Sometimes i even go full ap mordekaiser mid :3

I did it back in the day, pre rework used to shrek 

Ignite+ult = gothcha bitch!

Its actually really strong now thanks to deathfire.

You go deathfire get mpen reds and quints with armor and mres

Get yourself sorc boots and a liandries and from there just bull full ap.

You do pretty much true damage with your ult and do half hp or more
It used to be stronger when DFG was still in the game. You used to be able to one shot squishies with dfg, morde ult, ignite and liandries.
Class isn't a rare pick, probably one of the strongest mid laners currently
She is the 7th least picked mage in the game.
Yeah she is a bit popular atm.
